Id Nom Prénom Email Téléphone
{{client.id}} {{client.nom}} {{client.prenom}} {{client.email}} {{client.telephone}} Supprimer Modifier
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Commande } from '../model/commande.model'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { CommandeService } from '../services/commande.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-commande', templateUrl: './commandes.component.html', }) export class CommandesComponent implements OnInit { commandes?: Commande[]; constructor(private commandeService: CommandeService, private router : Router,) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.chargerCommandes(); } chargerCommandes() { this.commandeService.listeCommande().subscribe(cmds => { console.log(cmds); this.commandes = cmds; }); } supprimerCommande(c: Commande) { console.log(c.id); let conf = confirm("Etes-vous sûr ?"); if (conf) this.commandeService.supprimerCommande(c.id).subscribe(() => { console.log("commande supprimée"); this.chargerCommandes(); }); } }
